c74object.name: tap.loadbang
c74object.digest: loadbang with a delay and a message
c74object.description: The tap.loadbang object is a simple but handy abstraction built around the standard loadbang object in Max.

objarg.name: delaytime
objarg.description: Sets a time by which to delay the loadbang

objarg.name: message
objarg.description: Sets a symbol to send when the loadbang fires
